long_description: These Julbo Micropore glacier glasses give complete protection for skiing, mountaineering and other snow sports. Brown polycarbonate lenses block 100% of ultraviolet rays and 87% of visible light to reduce glare and create a clear image. Vented leather side shields block peripheral light and can be removed as needed. Micropore nosebridge has vents to keep lenses fog-free. Copper/nickel frames are lightweight and durable; temples can be molded for a snug, comfortable fit. Protective case included.
short_description: These Julbo Micropore glacier glasses give complete protection for skiing, mountaineering and other snow sports.
